rules.content: Target creature you control gains flying and gets +1/+0 until end of turn if it is enticed to a creature card that has flying. The same is true for menace, haste, and first strike.
For example, if the creature is enticed to a creature with flying and first strike, it gains flying and first strike and gets +2/+0 until end of turn
You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.
